posts.post_content:
Looking for an N171 Miss Lotta Crabtree. Will gladly overpay for one of these. PSA pop report shows one. Maybe theres another floating around out there raw? PM me if you have one or any leads. Would also be interested in any other Lotta cards, photos, or CDVs. Thanks in advance! 

Mike

Sent from my SM-G950U using Tapatalk

[quote name="realbigfatdog" post=2052605]Looking for an N171 Miss Lotta Crabtree. Will gladly overpay for one of these. PSA pop report shows one. Maybe theres another floating around out there raw? PM me if you have one or any leads. Would also be interested in any other Lotta cards, photos, or CDVs. Thanks in advance! 

Mike

Sent from my SM-G950U using Tapatalk[/QUOTE]

*My Apologies...Wrong Actress :)
Mike-If you don't mind me asking, why the interest? I have st least one and will post an image.

[quote name="oldjudge" post=2052610]Mike-If you don't mind me asking, why the interest? I have st least one and will post an image.[/QUOTE]I am a collector of the local history in the town where I live (Hopatcong, NJ). Miss Lotta was a famous summer resident here, building a "cottage" (mansion) in a very exclusive community here on the lake around the turn of the century (or shortly before). There's even a boat that does cruises for passengers around the lake called the Miss Lotta, named after her. I actually proposed to my wife on it. As such, I have become mildly obsessed with collecting anything to do with her. Also, now that it's getting harder and harder to find (or afford) any Hal Chase items I still need, I'm focusing my collecting on her more these days. 

Mike

Sent from my SM-G950U using Tapatalk

[quote name="oldjudge" post=2052728]Lotta[/QUOTE]Those are amazing! Now, are they for sale??

Sent from my SM-G950U using Tapatalk
Sorry, they are not doubles and I collect the Old Judge and Gypsy Queen numbered series.

Understood. I appreciate you sharing them.  It's the first I've ever seen of any of her cards from these sets. If you ever change your mind about selling, please let me know. Thanks again! 

Sent from my SM-G950U using Tapatalk
Is that the elusive Lotta Players League card?

Bumping this one up. Still actively searching for a Lotta N171, actress series. 

Sent from my SM-G950U using Tapatalk

So awesome! Let me know if you ever change your mind. [emoji173]
